name: Brain Box
description:
Brain Box - Atmospheric Maze Puzzle

A Relaxing zen puzzle game, set in low poly atmospheric world.

Reach to the gem by solving maze and manipulating environment though player to reach the subsequent level.

Controls: Use arrow keys to move the the player.

Social: Facebook | Twitter
Mail: TheMukulNegi@gmail.com

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS-

Minimum:

OS: Windows Vista / Windows 7 or newer
Processor: 2.4GHz Dual Core
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 9800 / ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT
DirectX: Version 10
Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:

OS: Windows Vista / Windows 7 or newer
Processor: 2.4GHz Dual Core
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: 1 GB NVIDIA 460 / AMD Radeon 5870
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 2 GB available space
